Constructs a new {{tt|atomic_weak_ptr}} object.
@1@ The default constructor initializes the object to an empty state.
@2@ Initializes the underlying {{tt|weak_ptr&lt;T&gt;}} with {{tt|desired}}. The initialization is not atomic.
@3@ Atomic variables are not {{named req|CopyConstructible}}.
